snippet.title: 10 Powerful Legendaries That Are EASY To Get In Borderlands 4
snippet.description:
Vault Hunters, legendary loot is here! In this Borderlands 4 guide we cover 10 early game legendary weapons, shields, and gear you need to farm right now. From Husky Friend and Aegon’s Dream to Firewerks, Noisy Cricket, Stop Gap, and more, these are the best Borderlands 4 legendary drops to supercharge your build.

0:00 Intro
0:18 All 10 Legendaries
0:51 Husky Friend
2:50 Aegon's Dream
4:41 Sho Kunai
6:03 Firewerks
7:47 Noisy Cricket
9:29 Stop Gap
11:15 Onslaught
13:07 Asher's Rise
14:29 Ravenfire
15:56 Triple Bypass
17:09 Subscribe For More Borderlands 4
